title: The Most Dangerous Global Flashpoints
sub_head: From the South China Sea to Iran, students discuss the world and America’s role in it.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss dangers for American foreign policy in the coming year. Next week we’ll ask, “In the wake of the COP26 Summit on climate, what can we conclude about climate summits? Do they do any good? Or are they exercises in feel-goodism?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Nov. 9. The best responses will be published that night.
